>      public static Test =
suite(Class testClass) {
>          TestSetup suite =3D new junit.extension=
s.TestSetup(new

etUp() {

         }

 tear down at the end of suite execution

d it in test case base classes to

ative classes. In the example

lass, but you could extend it  
> or just add additional methods to provide=
 the behavior needed.
